meanings.meaning: 5. reason; logic See also 筋が通るきみが言っていることは筋があまりよく通っていない。There isn't much logic in what you're saying.

10. source (of information, etc.); circle; channel 私は去年、それを別の筋から聞いた。I heard about it from another source last year.
15. gristly fish paste (made of muscle, tendons, skin, etc.) Abbreviation, See also 筋蒲鉾
